channel.title: `Java` is not a reconized as an internal or external command
channel.description: When some times i try to compile or run a [b]client[/b] says it on the command prompt thing : [b]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/b]
